title: Vending Machines x ML
summary: Optimized nationwide vending machine operations for Yeo’s Pte Ltd with clustering and route-scheduling ML.
bullets: Built clustering & scheduling algorithms to minimize delivery distance and idle time
Developed a PowerBI + ArcGIS dashboard for real-time KPI tracking
details: Collaborated with Yeo’s operations team to integrate live vending-sales data.
Achieved a 20% reduction in fuel costs and 15% faster delivery times.

title: React Game Site
summary: Launched a React mini-game for Sengkang General Hospital’s staff-giving campaign (4,000+ users).
bullets: Designed & deployed a browser game to boost staff engagement in internal network
Streamlined campaign tracking by integrating backend APIs with React
details: Coordinated UAT with communications & IT leads to meet tight campaign deadlines.
Drove a 30% increase in donation participation during the campaign period.

title: RAG LLM App
summary: Built a local RAG agent on Ollama to query PDFs in natural language, fully offline.
bullets: Implemented vector store and retrieval pipeline in Python
Integrated front-end with custom PDF uploader and query interface
details: Designed for privacy: no data leaves the user’s machine.
Supported multi-page documents and semantic search across sections.

title: Bacteria Simulation
summary: Agent-based PyGame/Matplotlib sim to study invasive species with genetic traits.
bullets: Modeled bacterial behavior using rule-based agents and graphical output
Visualized population dynamics over varying simulation parameters
details: Selected for the 2024 SUTD ESD Industry Showcase.
Enabled users to tweak genetic mutation rates and observe long-term effects.

title: Maze Solver
summary: Genetic-algorithm demo solving mazes, aimed as an educational ML introduction.
bullets: Evolved populations of candidate solutions to navigate grid mazes
Visualized fitness improvements across generations
details: Designed simplified interface for younger audiences to learn evolutionary methods.
Supported custom maze uploads and fitness function tuning.

title: Data Analysis on Hunger
summary: Investigated African hunger trends by combining ML and humanities data approaches.
bullets: Cleaned multi-source datasets and engineered features for economic factors
Built interactive dashboards in Excel & HTML for cultural insights
details: Presented findings at a student-led research symposium.
Highlighted correlations between GDP, education, and food insecurity.

title: Sushi Restaurant Game
summary: RShiny queue-management game simulating customer flow in sushi restaurants.
bullets: Modeled real-world arrival rates and service times
Implemented dynamic UI updates in RShiny
details: Designed to help managers improve throughput without additional staff.
Won praise for intuitive controls and clear visual feedback.

title: Fingerprint Inpainting
summary: Developed a fingerprint inpainting model using U-Net-inpsired architecture.
bullets: Trained on synthetic fingerprint datasets to restore missing ridge patterns
Implemented data augmentation techniques to improve model robustness
details: Focused on enhancing forensic analysis by accurately reconstructing partial prints.
Achieved state-of-the-art results on benchmark datasets.

title: EmpathIQ
summary: Developed an empathetic AI communication coach to enhance medical students in patient interactions.
bullets: Used Java, Kafka, and Spring Boot to build a real-time feedback system
Developed a simple avatar interface for immersive training sessions
Integrated NLP techniques to analyze and improve communication skills
details: Collaborated with TTSH to create a realistic training environment for medical students.
Won 2nd place at the SUTD Design Awards for innovation in medical education.

title: Digital App Gallery
summary: Developed an app store for the Land Transport Authority to promote cross-department collaboration.
bullets: Built a React portal to showcase internal apps and tools
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using AWS CodePipeline and CodeDeploy
Designed user-friendly interfaces and analytics for easy navigation and discovery
details: Deployed to over 6,000 users, enhancing internal digitalization efforts.
Automated deployment processes.
